title: Project 1
description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive marketing automation platform using HubSpot, creating triggered email sequences that resulted in a 300% increase in email engagement and 45% improvement in lead conversion rates. The solution included responsive email templates, A/B testing workflows, and advanced segmentation strategies. Integration with Salesforce CRM ensured seamless lead handoff and tracking throughout the customer journey.
